mapper.select: SELECT basic_code , basic_name FROM basic_code ORDER BY basic_code
SELECT detail_code , detail_name , detail_explain , detail_avail FROM basic_code b, detail_code d WHERE b.basic_code = d.basic_code AND d.basic_code = #{basicCode} ORDER BY detail_code
SELECT * FROM detail_code d, vend v, emp e WHERE v.vend_cd = d.basic_code||d.detail_code AND v.emp_code = e.emp_code AND detail_avail = 'Y' ORDER BY detail_code
SELECT * FROM emp e, detail_code d WHERE e.emp_code = d.basic_code||d.detail_code
SELECT * FROM detail_code WHERE basic_code = 'RSC' AND detail_avail = 'Y' ORDER BY detail_code
SELECT DISTINCT(detail_name) , SUBSTR(detail_code, 1, LENGTH(detail_code) - 3) detail_code FROM detail_code WHERE basic_code = 'RSC' ORDER BY 1
SELECT * FROM rsc WHERE rsc_cd = #{rscCd} ORDER BY rsc_cd
SELECT * FROM detail_code d, edcts e WHERE d.full_code = e.pro_cd AND basic_code = 'PRO' AND detail_avail = 'Y' ORDER BY detail_code
SELECT * FROM edcts WHERE pro_cd = #{proCd} ORDER BY pro_cd

SELECT b.bom_sq , b.prcs_cd , p.prcs_nm , p.prcs_explain FROM bom b, prcs p WHERE b.prcs_cd = p.prcs_cd AND b.pro_cd = #{proCd} GROUP BY b.bom_sq, b.prcs_cd, p.prcs_nm, p.prcs_explain ORDER BY b.bom_sq
SELECT b.rsc_cd , r.rsc_nm , b.use_cnt , r.rsc_unit , p.prcs_nm FROM bom b, rsc r, prcs p WHERE b.rsc_cd = r.rsc_cd AND b.prcs_cd = p.prcs_cd AND b.pro_cd = #{proCd} ORDER BY b.bom_sq
SELECT b.rsc_cd , r.rsc_nm , b.use_cnt , r.rsc_unit FROM bom b, rsc r WHERE b.rsc_cd = r.rsc_cd AND b.pro_cd = #{proCd} AND b.prcs_cd = #{prcsCd}
SELECT * FROM prcs ORDER BY prcs_cd
SELECT * FROM rsc ORDER BY rsc_cd
